nodes.text: The Bright Jewel Ribbon was a quadrant of space located in the Bright Jewel system. It was located between the Lucent Ivaya and the Scarlet Dawn quadrants.

During the Galactic Civil War, Aleas Rans'ery oversaw all Car'das operations in the Bright Jewel Ribbon quadrant. During the Battle of Tansarii Point Station between Car'das and Black Sun forces, Rans'ery dispatched pilots to attacks Black Sun ships in the area. Her pilots also rescued the Kallor brothers Sulale and Waris from a Black Sun ambush, as well as  First Officer Atris of the Dynath Miners. Car'das pilots eventually eliminated the ace and Black Sun hero Arlem Demonhunter in the Bright Jewel Ribbon.
